com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui

Interface AnswerFeedback

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QuizzesComponent

    public interface AnswerFeedback
extends QuizzesComponent
    Component that produces ta feedback for a question response. This component should be included in the review page of a question. It produces a line for each checked assertion and shows whether it was satisfied by the response. This object is always built from QuizzesComponentBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.QuizzesComponent

        getElement

    • Method Detail

      • setEmbedded

        void setEmbedded(AnswerField component)
        Makes this answer feedback a floating panel sticked to the given component. This feedback panel will be shown as a popup when mouseover or click the given component, and will be invisible otherwise. This is necessary when there is no static space to set the answer feedback, as in the case of cloze questions.
        Parameters:
        component - The component where to attach this object.

      • removeEmbedded

        void removeEmbedded(AnswerField component)
        Remove the embedded feedback from a component.
        Parameters:
        component - The component from where to detach the feedback.

      • showCorrectAnswerFeedback

        void showCorrectAnswerFeedback(boolean visible)
        Whether to show the line indicating the correct answer.

      • showAssertionsFeedback

        void showAssertionsFeedback(boolean visible)
        Whether to show the feedback for individual assertions.

      • showFieldDecorationFeedback

        void showFieldDecorationFeedback(boolean visible)
        Whether to decorate embedded answer component.
        See Also:
        setEmbedded(com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.AnswerField)

      • setAnswerWeight

        void setAnswerWeight(double fraction)
        Set the weight of the chosen correct answer. Sometimes it is useful to define more than one correct answers for the same short answer question. Then it is possible for the question engine to set a different grade for each defined answer. Using this method the feedback decoration will adapt to the final grade.
        Parameters:
        weight - between 0.0 (incorrect) and 1.0 (correct). In fact all values between the two bounds have the same effect on decoration.
